subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Olympic Games (2016)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Brazil and its marquee stadium, the Maracanã, is set to be the site of an unprecedented double after hosting this year's World Cup and the 2016 Summer Olympics.
snippet: Brazil and its marquee stadium, the Maracanã, is set to be the site of an unprecedented double after hosting this year's World Cup and the 2016 Summer Olympics.
